chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
var: nat -> fol.Term L
apply: forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L
equal: fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
atomic: forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L
impH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
notH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
forallH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
orH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
andH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
existH: nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
iffH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
ifThenElseH: fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L
Prf: fol.Formulas L -> fol.Formula L -> Set
SysPrf: fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop
termsMap: forall m : nat, fol.Terms L m -> fol.Terms L m -> nat -> fol.Term L

Goal:
forall (a b t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (T : fol.System L), SysPrf T (equal a b) -> SysPrf T (equal (substituteTerm L t v a) (substituteTerm L t v b))

Premises:

equalFunction : forall (T : fol.System L) (f : Functions L) (ts ss : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f))), PairwiseEqual T (arity L (inr f)) ts ss -> SysPrf T (equal (apply f ts) (apply f ss))
substituteFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
Formula_depth_rec_indep : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (rec : forall a : fol.Formula L, (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> Q b -> P b) -> Q a -> P a), (forall (a : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> Q b -> P b), (forall (b : fol.Formula L) (p : lt_depth L b a) (q : Q b), z1 b p q = z2 b p q) -> forall q : Q a, rec a z1 q = rec a z2 q) -> forall (a : fol.Formula L) (q : Q a), Formula_depth_rec L (fun x : fol.Formula L => Q x -> P x) rec a q = rec a (fun (b : fol.Formula L) (_ : lt_depth L b a) => Formula_depth_rec L (fun x : fol...
subAllFormula_ext : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarFormula L f) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllFormula L f m1 = subAllFormula L f m2
subAllCloseFrom : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), folProof.SysPrf L T (closeFrom L 0 n f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (subAllFormula L f (fun x : nat => if le_lt_dec n x then fol.var L x else m x))
subFormulaNTE : forall (L : Language) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), (forall (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarFormula L f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) f)) /\ (forall (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarFormula L f)) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s) (substituteFormula L f v1 s))) /\ (forall (v1 v2 : nat) (s1 s2 : fol.Term L), v1 <> v2 -> ~ In v2 (freeVarTerm L s1) -> ~ In v1 (freeVarTerm L s2) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol....
subAllTerms_ext : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllTerms L n ts m1 = subAllTerms L n ts m2

```coq
intros a b t v T prf.
unfold substituteTerm.
rewrite (subAllCloseFrom L (arity L (inr f)) _ (equal a b) T prf).
rewrite (subAllCloseFrom L (arity L (inr f)) _ a T prf).
rewrite (subAllCloseFrom L (arity L (inr f)) _ b T prf).
reflexivity.
Qed.```
